name: 石
description: Basic material that forms the earth's crust. Essential for primitive tools and construction.

name: 木材
description: Natural material obtained from trees. Used for fuel and basic construction.

name: 粘土
description: Soil composed of fine particles. Raw material for pottery and construction.

name: 火
description: A controlled phenomenon of combustion. Generates energy and light. Essential for pottery and smelting.

name: 種
description: Plant seeds for growing crops. Foundation of agriculture.

name: 作物
description: Harvested agricultural produce. Essential food source.

name: 銅鉱石
description: Naturally occurring metal ore. The first metal used by humans.

name: 炉
description: A structure for heating materials at high temperatures. Used for smelting and pottery firing.

name: 燃料
description: A substance that burns to generate energy. Used for heating furnaces.

name: 土器
description: A hard container made by firing clay. Used for food storage.

name: 石炭
description: A fuel rich in carbon. Burns at higher temperatures than wood. Essential for iron smelting.

name: 鉄鉱石
description: Metallic ore found in nature. When refined

name: 鉄インゴット
description: A block of refined iron. Suitable shape for processing. Essential for iron tools and permanent structures.

name: 銅インゴット
description: A block of refined copper. Used for bronze making.

name: 錫鉱石
description: Soft metal ore. Used for making bronze.

name: 錫インゴット
description: A block of refined tin. Used for bronze alloy.

name: 青銅
description: An alloy of copper and tin. Harder than pure copper. Used since ancient times.

name: 貯蔵容器
description: A structure for storing food and materials. Essential for food stockpiling.

name: 恒久建築物
description: A durable building made with iron. Represents advanced civilization.

name: 農具
description: A tool for farming. Essential for stable food production.
